annotation_sentence: I look for, um... leather bag. It is good quality.

annotation_sentence: Ah, yes. Over there, that shop. But, it is... um... a little expensive, I think.

annotation_sentence: Um, can we ask, maybe... 60 dollars? It is close to my budget.
